title: When Pat pays, she eats the cheaper hotdog

content.prompt: Let MUs be the marginal utility of a sandwich, MUh be the marginal utility of a hot dog, Ps be the price of a sandwich, and Ph be the price of a hot dog. When the price of the goods is zero, Pat eats a sandwich. When Pat has to pay, she eats a hot dog. When Pat has to pay, which of the following is necessarily true?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
